name: Fertilizer
description:
Alaska, a girl who loves to take care of plants, draw and hang out with her best friend. This time she will need your help to fertilize the new plants which she bought and I'm sure you will work well together. I think you'll even learn a few new and effective gardening tips! 

Fertilizer is a short RPG maker horror game. A full playthrough takes about 20-30 minutes. There is only one ending in the game.

Content warning:
  • The game has mild swearing, blood and a slight body horror

Game by: autokyasuto
